name: Vanshika Kapoor
summary: GCI is a great platform to learn, it has helped me to start from the basics and has always pushed me to learn more. Without it I couldn't have made a move to learn code. Thankyou GCI for being such a great support

name: Harsha Gupta
summary: It was a very good experience learning with GCI. No matter what time it is, they're always available to help at any step. The milestones were very efficient and gave me a clear understanding of the topics. I'm glad to be a part of GCI.

name: Kashika Jain
summary: The experience of being associated with Girl Code It since past few months has been a wonderful one. The various resources regarding scholarship and events to participate in have proven to be successful team efforts of our mentors.

name: Aastha Aggarwal
summary: The mentors are amazing & they help open heartedly so I am now able to think myself for alternative solution of a problem with the help of their guidance. Moreover, the quantity and quality of questions are superb.

name: Raksha Gupta
summary: As gci is very active, there's always a push to do things. The best thing about this community is that, here, I always feel like I have to do this.
